Name: Space Gliders
About the game: You are a young engineer trying to help your community. Three generations ago, your species had to flee the motherland and inhabit a new planet. The land you are currently occupying is barely livable - yet, the majority of your kin has forgot that it was meant to be a temporary solution. If you play your cards right, while exploring new land you will discover the roots of your ancestors. Protect your family on a quest for survival and a better future. Sky is not the limit. Space Gliders is a point and click adventure game with emphasis on the people you interact with instead of the items you use.
